TopicTitle: New Channel and New KSP Series

Articles.Content:
So I started a new gaming channel (big whoop, so what) Wait! Just hear me out for a moment, I suffer from depression and I've had a lot of difficulty dealing with certain thoughts, but I've managed to find ways to live with some of those and move past others. One such issue I had was not finding any joy playing certain video games, like KSP, which as a lover of science, is a painful and annoying thing to experience since KSP is such an awesome game. I have two KSP series currently ongoing, a Career Mode which I'm currently doing daily and an Overhaul Series which has taken a sudden slow down as I was completely unaware at just how difficult that game was, like, holy heck, that entire mod is damn hard. But I'm just happy that I'm playing KSP again and uploading videos around them -- I do do other games, or intend to do other games, but I feel KSP will be the primary focus on my channel along with other science based games.

Anyway, I'm hoping things go a little better with this new channel than my previous one, which I feel was plagued by some dead accounts and bots which caused some issues in the long run. (It gave me a high sub count, but I was having low view counts by comparison, and anyone who saw those two things may have thought I bought subs, thus causing those people to never again look at my content. A sad cycle of annoyance as it means my channel stops growing in some ways)

Lastest Videos

If anyone has anything they can share, like tid bits of gaming info that can help this long time gamer of KSP improve, then I am all for it. I never claim to be the best at something, as I always know that there is someone out there who knows a little more in something and can teach me something new. Plus, I'd love to get some ideas about future missions since I'm coming up with all the basic ones -- space stations around planets, probe landers, etc, etc

KSP Career Mode Playlist

Edited October 29, 2015 by Tygrex
Updated Oct 22nd 2015. Added Episode 5 of Career Mode to the playlist a the start of this thread.

Updated Oct 23rd 2015. Added Episode 6 of Career Mode to the playlist a the start of this thread. Started a new range of probes named after the Pioneer probes that were created by NASA during the early days of exploring the Moon.

Updated Oct 24th 2015. Added Episode 7 of Career Mode to the playlist at the start of this thread. My Pioneer Probes are doing very well and have even landed on not just the Mun, but also Minmus Progress!
Wow, you are going to be better than me.

Wow, you are going to be better than me.

I've seen some of your videos, you have a lot of potential and a very positive attitude. Keep at them and keep improving on your craft, One can only go up from where they are

Updated Oct 25th 2015. Added episode 8 of Career Mode to the playlist. Haven't been doing much in the way of planes and such so I thought I'd focus my time on them since I really need to improve my craft on them. Who knows, maybe I'll get to build a working SSTO Space Plane (One of the goals I'd so like to tick off)

Updated 26th Oct 2015. Added Episode 9 of KSP Career Mode. Completed a tonne of contracts in this one that helps with funding and since I'm playing on Hard Difficult, funding is sort of very important.

Updated 27th Oct 2015. Added Episode 10 of KSP Career Mode. I try to rescue Valnetina Kerman whom I stranded in orbit around Kerbin some episodes ago. Things don't exactly go well, but when does anything go right the first time in this game?

Updated Oct 28th 2015. Added Episode 11 of KSP Career Mode. Bill gets a tonne of science in this one, and still firmly believe Squad missed out on an opportunity to make him a scientist rather than an engineer . . . you know, because of Bill Nye?

Updated 29th Oct 2015. Added Episode 12 of KSP Career Mode. Perhaps the saddest intro to any episode I will ever make which shows Stelphia's last mission in the program. However, with her death, we are able to motivate the other kerbonauts into living up to her memory by doing the near impossible.
